name: Sample Chemistry Questions
description: Basic chemistry concepts and atomic structure
subject: Chemistry

questions.subject: Chemistry
questions.question: What is the charge of a proton?
questions.explanation: Protons have a positive charge, while electrons have a negative charge and neutrons are neutral.

questions.subject: Chemistry
questions.question: Ionic bonds form between metals and non-metals.
questions.explanation: Ionic bonds typically form between metals (which lose electrons) and non-metals (which gain electrons).

questions.subject: Chemistry
questions.front: What does the atomic number represent?
questions.back: The number of protons in an atom's nucleus, which determines the element's identity.
